# Pizza Order System (ASP.NET Core MVC)
Student: yuval matasaro (ID: 991735973)
A simple two-layer Pizza Ordering System built with ASP.NET Core MVC.
- Presentation Layer: Controllers + Views - Service Layer: Business logic (pricing, discount, tax) - No database; all processing is in-memory.
## Features - Order form: customer name, pizza type (Plain/Crispy), size (Small/Medium/Large), quantity - Price rules: - Plain: Small $10, Medium $15, Large $20 - Crispy: Small $12, Medium $18, Large $25 - Discount: 10% if quantity > 2 - HST: 13% applied after discount - Receipt shows all details (name, type/size/qty, price per item, subtotal, discount, tax, total)
## Project Structure - Models: `OrderInputModel`, `ReceiptModel` - Services: `IPizzaOrderService`, `PizzaOrderService` - Controller: `HomeController` (GET/POST Index) - Views: `Home/Index` (form), `Home/Receipt` (detailed bill) - DI: `Program.cs` registers `AddScoped<IPizzaOrderService, PizzaOrderService>()`
## Run 1. Build: ``` dotnet build "Pizza Order System.sln" ``` 2. Run (HTTP on port 5093): ``` dotnet run --project "Pizza Order System/Pizza Order System.csproj" --no-launch-profile --urls http://localhost:5093 ``` 3. Open: - http://localhost:5093/
## Notes - Uses Bootstrap via CDN for simple styling, and two SVG pizza icons in `wwwroot/images`. - Client-side validation uses jQuery Validation via CDN; server-side validation is enforced by data annotations. - All source files include the student name/ID header as required.
